title: Kemben (breast Cloth), 1900–50
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: tied resist patterning in weft (ikat) on plain weave with continuous supplementary weft patterning
description: Breast cloth (kemben) or shoulder cloth (selendang) with long narrow field patterned by diamond grid in shades of red, with orange, green, and purple weft ikat. Embellished by gold and silver brocading. Panel at each end with symmetrical trees on hanging pendant forms in gold and silver brocading separated from field by gold diamond patterned band. Narrow gold patterned outer border runs the full length. Warp fringe (about 14cm or 5.5") knotted at end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Kemben (breast Cloth), 1900–50.Medium: cotton
Technique: tied resist patterning in weft (ikat) on plain weave with continuous supplementary weft patterning. 1972-6-2.
